modName: Unenchanted and Enchantable Aetherial Crown Dawnguard
summary: Unenchanted/ enchantable Aetherial Crown. For players who would rather put on their own enchantment(s) than have the vanilla one. Two versions: 1 lb and default 2lb. Works with Skyrim SE.
descriptionHtml:
Unenchanted/ enchantable Aetherial Crown, for players who want to put on their own enchantment(s) rather than have the vanilla "2 Guardian Stone" enchantment.  Just something I made for myself and thought I'd share.

You must craft the crown at the Aetherium Forge at the end of the "Lost to the Ages" Dawnguard quest, this file doesn't add it. At the forge, the crown won't have any enchantment.  You can also install the mod after you've made the crown to remove the vanilla enchantment.  Either way, the crown will then be ready for any enchantment(s) you've learned that apply to circlets.

Two versions: 1 lb and default 2lb - yeah, I know Skyrim isn't necessarily in pounds. 

Apparently works just fine with Skyrim SE (don't have the SE myself, but has been confirmed by a user).

Dawnguard is, obviously, required. Install via NMM/ Mod Organizer, or manually by unzipping the file and copying & pasting the esp into "skyrim/data"
author: KevKiev
